channel.title: Comments on: Loot the Damn Hounds!

item.title: By: Hound
item.dc:creator: Hound
item.description: isn't there a mod to track who has teh loot?
item.content:encoded: isn’t there a mod to track who has teh loot?

item.title: By: Maffix
item.dc:creator: Maffix
item.description:
Crappy guilds? LOL
Surely every raid is full of crap? it's full of 40 self-minded, often egotistical nerdy freaks with various personal issues. At least three of those 40 people are capable of ninjalooting, /gquit-ing and server transferring (possibly getting ebay ready) on a whim.
Why do you think we all visit afkgamer.com? For a lighthearted 'oh that'll never happen to me and my online buddies lols' chuckle? Well partly yes - but you can't beat a bit of DRAMA :) That's what makes playing online interesting for me!
item.content:encoded:
Crappy guilds? LOL

Surely every raid is full of crap? it’s full of 40 self-minded, often egotistical nerdy freaks with various personal issues. At least three of those 40 people are capable of ninjalooting, /gquit-ing and server transferring (possibly getting ebay ready) on a whim.

Why do you think we all visit afkgamer.com? For a lighthearted ‘oh that’ll never happen to me and my online buddies lols’ chuckle? Well partly yes – but you can’t beat a bit of DRAMA ðŸ™‚ That’s what makes playing online interesting for me!

item.title: By: Brent Michael Krupp
item.dc:creator: Brent Michael Krupp
item.description: You guys are all in crappy guilds if you're worried about ninjalooting. I've never been in a guild that used anything but FFA and I've never seen any ninjalooting. If you don't trust the other 39 people on a raid with you, I feel really sorry for you and how lousy your WoW experience must be.
item.content:encoded: You guys are all in crappy guilds if you’re worried about ninjalooting. I’ve never been in a guild that used anything but FFA and I’ve never seen any ninjalooting. If you don’t trust the other 39 people on a raid with you, I feel really sorry for you and how lousy your WoW experience must be.

item.title: By: aaron
item.dc:creator: aaron
item.description:
The shame loot thing is funny. Regarding ninja looters, after the bajillionth AQ40 run I have a hard enough time getting people to ask for items let alone have someone take without asking.
The only real problem are those that shift looted those goggles in MC i think.
item.content:encoded:
The shame loot thing is funny. Regarding ninja looters, after the bajillionth AQ40 run I have a hard enough time getting people to ask for items let alone have someone take without asking.

The only real problem are those that shift looted those goggles in MC i think.

item.title: By: Chuck
item.dc:creator: Chuck
item.description: There will be mass /gkicks the day that we can tell who isn't looting the damn hounds.
item.content:encoded: There will be mass /gkicks the day that we can tell who isn’t looting the damn hounds.

item.title: By: Yunk
item.dc:creator: Yunk
item.description: I meant they can "only" ninja once.

item.title: By: Yunk
item.dc:creator: Yunk
item.description:
People shift click or have other accidents using FFA. Though usually someone one can ninja something once.
People not looting is a constant problem starting with UBRS and continuing to all the dragon killing you have to do for the Ony key chain. No one wants to loot dragons.
Our group yells "SHAME LOOT!" where we all run up to the dog and click on it, so the person who didn't loot doesn't have to go up by himself. This started as a joke but now we do it all the time.
item.content:encoded:
People shift click or have other accidents using FFA. Though usually someone one can ninja something once.

People not looting is a constant problem starting with UBRS and continuing to all the dragon killing you have to do for the Ony key chain. No one wants to loot dragons.

Our group yells “SHAME LOOT!” where we all run up to the dog and click on it, so the person who didn’t loot doesn’t have to go up by himself. This started as a joke but now we do it all the time.

item.title: By: Maffix
item.dc:creator: Maffix
item.description:
LOL. Have you not typed 'warcraft ninja' into Google video search? FFA loot. Every. Single. One.
And no I don't believe you know and trust all 40 people in your raid.
item.content:encoded:
LOL. Have you not typed ‘warcraft ninja’ into Google video search? FFA loot. Every. Single. One.

And no I don’t believe you know and trust all 40 people in your raid.

item.title: By: Brent Michael Krupp
item.dc:creator: Brent Michael Krupp
item.description:
I totally don't get this one. Who raids anywhere with their guild and doesn't use free-for-all loot? My guilds have always yelled at people that *do* loot the hounds as that's the responsibility of a single person who is collecting the cores and other drops for the guild bank.
What is the point of not using FFA? If you don't trust your guildmates, you need a new guild. Not a macro yelling at them to loot.
item.content:encoded:
I totally don’t get this one. Who raids anywhere with their guild and doesn’t use free-for-all loot? My guilds have always yelled at people that *do* loot the hounds as that’s the responsibility of a single person who is collecting the cores and other drops for the guild bank.

What is the point of not using FFA? If you don’t trust your guildmates, you need a new guild. Not a macro yelling at them to loot.
